[{"id":"589f44a0-592a-46fb-b773-54ba50786a6c","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: visit_Import","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7592b305-9545-4281-a5f5-fc27f9722a92","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description:
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Handles Python import statements encountered in the AST. It resolves module paths (including relative imports), triggers submodule analysis when needed, and updates scopes, definitions, and call graph edges to reflect imported symbols.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8b19a0d6-bb9a-467c-b9b6-bed4a9128302","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Parameters:","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e35b5a87-f2d8-40e4-9b0a-63dafe6282d8","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"node","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":": The AST node representing the import statement.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"5889f9a0-8c3f-477a-a8f1-92c45afc4483","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"prefix","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (str, optional): The module prefix (e.g., "pandas" in ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"from pandas import DataFrame","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"). Defaults to "".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"49d42ecb-15c4-4652-b0e4-32ed849c2c4e","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"level","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (int, optional): The relative import level (e.g., 1 for ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":".module","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", 2 for ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"..module","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"). Defaults to 0.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b45eca8a-48e2-4195-bdf9-ed79a787c678","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Implementation Details:
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"This method serves as the central handler for both standard ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"import X","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"from X import Y","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" statements (the latter delegates to this method via ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"visit_ImportFrom","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":").","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3a5c875a-a568-4866-8ac0-6fc384f83bcb","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Iterate Imports:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Loops through every name alias in the import node.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ba96d1df-4775-4fd2-8e3c-396783c20ecb","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Resolve Source:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Uses the internal ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"handle_src_name","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" helper to construct the full module path.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f81a04cc-3be7-429d-bed4-e5598db6d9bc","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Module Resolution:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Queries the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"import_manager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to find the actual file path of the imported module.","styles":{}}],"children":[{"id":"a369ffb8-a51d-4a6f-9ae3-42b9e7b22897","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If the module cannot be resolved (e.g., a standard library or missing package), it calls ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"add_external_def","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to create a placeholder definition.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"010708a0-74e5-41c2-a91f-bbccdf213b75","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If resolved to a local Python file that hasn't been analyzed, it triggers ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"analyze_submodule","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" recursively.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"f6530e18-b913-4196-8b86-84878d511ef9","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Graph Update:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Adds a dependency edge to the call graph (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"cg","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") linking the current module to the imported one.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"5f1905ce-97fa-469b-bdfd-20776e33c2c1","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Scope Update:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Calls ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"handle_scopes","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to ensure the imported names are correctly registered in the current local scope.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"2aac63bc-c69f-4334-a5ba-72e6a3b192e1","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Sub-functions","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"12f2143b-d91c-47c5-ac83-bb11c3bb43f2","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: handle_src_name","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"df38da03-4743-40c1-aa68-800f5163f2db","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description:
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Constructs the fully qualified source module name for an import. If a prefix is provided (e.g., from a ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"from ... import ...","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" statement), it prepends the prefix to the imported name.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1917654e-f2cf-4f70-8df9-e93985f79f17","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: handle_scopes","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"99dc4d13-cfec-4771-a818-302d62ca51ae","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description:
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Manages how imported names are introduced into the current scope. It creates or links definitions based on whether a specific symbol or a wildcard import is used, and records value points that connect local names to their original definitions.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e538f38a-ecde-45ba-bd12-1e73f677f90c","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":4,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: add_external_def","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"775d471f-c028-44a2-9980-b3da83561b32","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description:
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Registers imports that cannot be resolved locally as external definitions. It creates placeholder definitions and links the target name in the current scope to the external symbol, preserving reference information for later analysis.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a11f4073-f126-4c98-bff8-7b252b90742f","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
